title: Step Configuration
description: All steps should have a defined configuration, this is how you define the step's behavior and how it will be triggered.

title: API Endpoint Configuration
description: POST endpoint at /ts/pets for creating new pets with type, name, path, method, and emits configuration.

title: Request Body Schema
description: Zod schema validation for pet data including name, species, and age with proper constraints.

title: Pet Creation
description: Creates a new pet record in the store using validated data from the request.

title: Event Emission
description: Emits 'pet.created' event with type-safe data to notify other parts of the system.

title: Handler Function
description: The handler function that executes when the API endpoint is called, processing the request and returning a response.

title: Logging
description: Structured logging for pet creation with context including petId, name, species, and status.

title: Success Response
description: Returns HTTP 201 status with the created pet object in the response body.

title: Error Handling
description: Comprehensive error handling for validation errors (400) and unexpected failures (500).
